channel.title: Why is npcs doing this to ME!
channel.description:
well first of all i spawned some guards, and i put there npcdrops in the .cfg file like this :
npcdrop = 9 995 12 75 //guard drop/coins/12 of it/75% chance drop. npcdrop = 9 2530 1 100 //guard drop/bones/1 of it/100% chance drop.
and yes i am tabing, but for some reason the npcs are not dropping what i put, they drop nothing at all. please help me. k0 gawd k0. and yes i got a npcdrops.java also.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2008, 01:31:56 pm[/size][hr]and i do compile and run also. :S

item.title: Why is npcs doing this to ME!
item.dc:creator: @sexy_slay sexy slay
item.description:
@sexy_slay wrote:

you have to go into the item2.jave through item4.java, then search the npc name, or code. The npcdrop.cfg doesnt work for all servers/sources.
Hope i could help =)

Read full topic
item.source: Why is npcs doing this to ME!
